title: Power ministry allocates 1972 MW additional electricity for J&K amid rising demand
description: The power ministry has allocated 1,500 MW from the central pool to meet the winter requirements of J&K. While under the Shakti policy, the union territory will get 472 MW, for which, a power purchase agreement is proposed to be signed by the end of December.
